oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reports of departments of the City of Nashville for the fiscal year ending December 31, 1897
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An 1897 illustrated yearbook, consisting of the official reports of the City Government of Nashville, Tennessee. Includes a Message of the Mayor R.H. Dudley to the City Council members, dated Jan. 13, 1898. This publication was prepared for the press by James T. Bell, Recorder. Forms part of the City of Nashville published reports. 1 yearbook.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Municipal government--Tennessee--Nashville; Municipal reports--Tennessee--Nashville; Mayors--Tennessee--Nashville; City councils--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville (Tenn.)--Politics and government
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Publications, City of Nashville reports, 1897 yearbook
